global.pmallow:

global.pmblock:

 You have been blocked for spamming.

✋Konichiwa!* 
Don't spamm or else I'll block you for spamming. _You have ${checkPermit.times} warning(s)._

global.permited:
Konichiwa! ${tname}*

Now You are permitted by my owner to pm now.

 *Powered by RONEN-BOTS
global.revoked:
*Konichiwa! ${tname}*

Your pm permit permission has been prevoked now.

 _Powered by RONEN-BOTS_
